title: Giselle
creator_credit: Associated Television, Stanley Dorfman and Rudolf Nureyev
brief_description: This made for television production of the classical ballet Giselle about love and betrayal stars Rudolf Nureyev as Count Albrect and Lynn Seymour as Giselle, with Monica Mason (Myrtha), Youri Vamos (Hilarion) and members of The Ballet of the Bavarian State Opera House. Original choreography by Jules Perrot and Jean Coralli, music by Adolphe Adam performed by The New World Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted and directed by David Coleman.
